mapper.insert: insert into ${church}.auth_in_charge (auth_in_charge_idx, auth_set_idx, manager_idx, group_no, reg_date) values (#{authInChargeIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authSetIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{managerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into ${church}.auth_in_charge
auth_in_charge_idx,
auth_set_idx,
manager_idx,
group_no,
reg_date,
#{authInChargeIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{authSetIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{managerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{groupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update ${church}.auth_in_charge
auth_set_idx = #{authSetIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manager_idx = #{managerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
group_no = #{groupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reg_date = #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where auth_in_charge_idx = #{authInChargeIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from ${church}.auth_in_charge where auth_set_idx in (select auth_set_idx from ${church}.auth_set where year=#{nextYear} and k_part=#{kPartIdx})
delete a from ${church}.auth_in_charge a inner join ${church}.auth_set b on a.auth_set_idx=b.auth_set_idx where b.year=#{nextYear} and k_part=0 and b.group_no is null
